籤詩版本二:
Lokacin da ruwan sama mai tsayi ya fara sharewa, Jade Rabbit da Crow na Zinariya suna haskakawa a hankali
Tsofaffin abubuwa sun bace kuma sabbin abubuwa sun bayyana, duba ku hadu da kofar dodanniya.
詩意:
Wannan hexagram alama ce ta dogon ruwan sama da haske na farko.
Komai yana tafiya kamar yadda aka tsara.
解曰: An kiyaye su da alloli da Buddha. Babu haɗarin bala'i. Da fatan an tashi lafiya. Komawa da girmamawa a karshe.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Jiang Taigong ya gana da Sarki Wen
Daular Zhou. Jiang Shang, mai suna Ziya. Mutanen Ji (daga Xuzhou a Tekun Gabashin China). Sunan Taoist Fei Xiong, kuma an rufe kakanninsa da Lu (sunan wuri), don haka ana kiransa Lu Wang.
Don kaucewa lokacin tashin hankali na sarki Zhou na daular Shang, ya rayu kusa da ruwan tekun gabashin kasar Sin, yana kuma kamun kifi a kogin Weishui. Kifin kifi ya mike, nufinsa ba don kifi ba ne, amma ya zama firayim minista nagari.
Sarki Wen na Zhou ya ji cewa yana da hikima kuma ya dauke shi malami (firayim minista). (Yana da shekaru tamanin a lokacin) Daga baya, sarki Wu na Zhou ya kai hari ga sarki Zhou, ya lalata daular Shang, ya kafa daular Zhou. Sarki Wu ya kira shi Shangfu. An ba dansa Ding Gong lakabin Marquis na Qi.
(Abin da wannan labarin ya mayar da hankali a kai: Jiang Taigong, wanda ya dade yana jiran kifi a kogin Weishui, a karshe ya fita daga cikin matsala kuma Sarki Wen ya sake amfani da shi.)
聖意: A cikin gidan, Zhongping ya yi addu'ar albarka da arziki, idan ba a yi ciniki ba, aure ya kan kasance ba bisa ka'ida ba, mata masu tafiya a Liujia sun toshe gonaki, tsutsotsin siliki sun toshe dabbobi shida, tare da neman mutum, a makara da yin hijira, sa'a asarar dukiya, cututtuka, da kaburbura a tsaunin Xingxing.
古人: Jiang Taigong ya gana da Sarki Wen
